item.title: A Glimpse of Summer
item.description: Full green trees Soft summer breeze Ripe Nectarines Nectarines invite With fruity fragrance Tempt a juicy bite The grass is deep Big boys play A whiff to keep

item.title: All hot air
item.description: I have probably never been on a hot air balloon but I can remember the experience. The large mass of deflated material which was to be the balloon, the basket in which we were to stand, the thick ropes which tied us to the ground and the blue blast of fire from a metallic tube-shaped apparatus above us which filled up the balloon with hot air allowing it to take shape.
